naslov: Ražanac, izvrsna obiteljska/apartmanska kuća s 3 jedinice, 194 m2 (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Odlična apartmanska kuća u Ražancu blizu Zadra, s tri stambene jedinice, odlično opremljena i u potpunosti namještena. Uzdiže se na dvije etaže sa 194 kvadrata bruto stambenog prostora, čvrste i kvalitetne gradnje. U prizemlju je vlasnički stan koji se sastoji od kombiniranog dnevnog boravka i blagovaonice, kuhinje, dvije spavaće sobe, kupaonice, ulaznog prostora i ostave. Vani se smjestila i lijepa natkrivena terasa a podno stubišta i dodatna ostava. Vanjskim se stubištem stiže na kat gdje su smještena dva manja apartmana. Svaki sadrži kombinirani dnevni boravak, blagovaonicu i kuhinju, po jednu manju spavaću sobu te kupaonicu. Apartmani dijele zajedničku prostranu natkrivenu terasu. Za ugodan boravak u kući brinu se klima uređaji u svakom stanu, u prizemlju je postavljeno i podno grijanje u kupaonici te peć na pelete, a tu je i kvalitetna PVC vanjska stolarija s dvoslojnim izo-staklima i komarnicima na svim prozorima, odlična hidro i termo izolacija (10 cm stiropor), bežični internet, zemaljska televizija s pametnim TV uređajem u svakoj stambenoj jedinici, kvalitetni laminati u spavaćim sobama i keramičke pločice u ostalim prostorijama, te sustav video nadzora. Nekretnina obuhvaća i pomoćni objekt koji se sastoji od komforne garaže i ljetne kuhinje (koja trenutno nije stavljena u funkciju), a krasi je i dvorišni natkriveni jacuzzi, terasa/sunčalište s tri ležaljke, zidani roštilj, vrtna garnitura, vanjski tuš, a nudi i pogled na more. Kuća je građevinski u odličnom stanju, bez i najmanjih nedostataka, u cijelosti ograđena, a svaka stambena jedinica ima i svoj zaseban ulaz. Apartmani na katu su novonamješteni, kategorizirani i nedavno pušteni u promet. U prizemlju je nedavno renovirana kupaonica, postavljeno podno grijanje i peć na pelete, te svi novi klima uređaji. Uz garažu, rezidencija pruža tri parkirna mjesta te lijepi i uređeni vrtni prostor. Vrlo je dobro prometno povezana, pripada mirnom i tihom predjelu Ražanca, s baš svim za boravak i život potrebnim dodatnim sadržajima u blizini, uključujući naravno more i plaže. --- Excellent apartment house in Ražanac near Zadar, with three residential units, very well equipped and completely furnished. It rises over two floors with 194 square meters of gross living space, of solid and quality construction. On the ground floor lies the owner’s apartment, which consists of combined living room and dining room, kitchen, two bedrooms, bathroom, entrance area and storage room. There is also a delightful covered terrace outside and an additional storage room under the stairs. An external staircase leads to the first floor where two smaller apartments are located. Each one contains a combined living room, dining room and kitchen, one small bedroom and a bathroom. Apartments share a common spacious covered terrace. For a comfortable stay in the house, air conditioning units are provided in each apartment, ground floor also includes underfloor heating in the bathroom and a pellet stove, and there is also quality PVC external carpentry with double-layer insulating glass and mosquito nets on all windows, excellent hydro and thermal insulation (10 cm styrofoam), wireless internet, terrestrial television with a smart TV device in each residential unit, quality laminates in bedrooms and ceramic tiles in other rooms, and video surveillance system. The property also encompasses an auxiliary building consisting of a comfortable garage and a summer kitchen (which is currently not put into operation), and it also includes courtyard covered jacuzzi, terrace/sundeck with three sunbeds, brick barbecue, garden furniture set, outdoor shower, and it offers sea ​​view. The house is in excellent construction condition, without the slightest of defects, completely fenced, and each residential unit has its own separate entrance. The apartments on the first floor are newly furnished, categorized and recently put into operation. On the ground floor, bathroom was recently renovated, underfloor heating and pellet stove installed, as well as all new air conditioning units. In addition to the garage, the residence extends three parking spaces and a beautiful and well-kept garden area. It is very well road connected, it belongs to a peaceful and quiet area of Ražanac, with virtually all the additional amenities necessary for stay and living being nearby, including of course the sea and beaches.
